_key.description: Unique key used when the column is part of a list of columns (each with its specific key)

testId.description: Unique ID used to localize the component using unit tests suites

width.description: Indicates column's width using a idea similar to Bootstrap grid system

isContainer.description: Enabler to make the column a container for a list of columns (with its own width based on container's width)

isMultiline.description: Used to render several components in more than 1 line and use column's designated width

children.description: Indicates which components (could be 1 or more) container in the column
